title: Steal a Githyanki Egg
content:
re powerful.

Steal a Githyanki Egg Objectives

Search the Githyanki Crèche for an egg.

Lady Esther has asked that we steal an egg from the githyanki. The Society of Brilliance want to incubate it, raise it, and soothe its so-called violent nature.

Steal a Githyanki Egg Walkthrough

Head to the Rosymorn Monastery Trail and then move along the main path onto a fork to activate the Trielta Crags Waypoint. Head northeast from here when the path splits. Keep going and then turn right at (X: -39, Y
